summary: Replaces the vanilla gold with a new highly detailed and high fidelity gold coin with dragon-like and Dwemer engravings.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/33563-3-1365283267.png[/img]
Replaces the vanilla gold with a new highly detailed and high fidelity gold coin with dragon-like and Dwemer engravings.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/33563-5-1365283267.png[/img]
[list][*][size=4][b]Skyrim[/b][/size][/*]
[/list][/center]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/33563-4-1365283267.png[/img]
Video features & reviews: Credits to TheOpology
[youtube]6jrEwzBeuU4[/youtube]


Max size of 2048x4096 px diffuse and normals tx maps.

[img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5518/9132332333_5413512f9f_n_d.jpg[/img][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3798/9134550472_d8d377311d_n_d.jpg[/img]


[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/33563-2-1365283267.png[/img][u]
Installing:[/u]
Choose a replacer from a directory and copy the "Data\" folder provided in the archive to your
Skyrim\Data directory.

Overwrite any other files when prompted.
[u]
Uninstalling:[/u]
Trace back to the contents of the archive and delete what you have previously added to your Skyrim\Data directory.


[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/33563-1-1365292602.png[/img]
Fordesigners.com: [url=http://www.fordesigner.com/maps/7681-0.htm]Dragon Vector classical circular material[/url]
author: jeclxohko
